name: The business class Qatar Airways doesn't talk about.
description:
Get Surfshark VPN at https://surfshark.deals/winginit - Enter promo code WINGINIT for 83% off + before the end of June get 3 months & Antivirus for FREE!

Qatar Airways' business class is the best in the world, right? I mean, if you're not getting their QSuite - the "World's Best Business Class" (my upcoming ANA review may throw some shade there!), you'll be in a reverse herringbone solo seat, one of the best in the sky. Some of those even have doors now! But Qatar has a fleet it doesn't talk about. Nowhere on their website can you find pictures of their A330 business class, a forgotten, somewhat embarrassing 2-2-2 configuration this airline just does not want to advertise it has! I had a flight on this recently, so let's check out the world's best airline's...."worst" business class.
